attributes.action: Stop the taxation of the retired who have paid tax during working life and then are heinously taxed on the money they have put by for their retirment upon being paid their pensions
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To be taxed twice seems nothing short of fraud.Those that have paid tax all their working lives and paid into either or both government and private pensions should be tax exempt.If this is impossible then the tax threshold for retired people should be raised to at least £25,000 per annum

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
